headline: Zoetis Inc. (ZTS): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Zoetis Inc. (NYSE:ZTS) on Substack by Best Anchor Stocks. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on ZTS. Zoetis Inc. (NYSE:ZTS)’s share was trading at $164.70 as of Dec 24th. ZTS’s trailing and forward P/E were 30.96 and 28.41 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Zoetis delivered an impressive […]

headline: The Wall Street Journal Vs. Zoetis
summary: Debunking claims of safety concerns around Zoetis Inc.'s OA pain drug, Librela. Click here for our updated look at ZTS stock and a look ahead.
